headline: Stocks Rally as Bond Yields Fall Before FOMC Meeting
summary: The S&P 500 Index ($SPX ) (SPY ) on Monday closed up +0.47%, the Dow Jones Industrials Index ($DOWI ) (DIA ) closed up +0.11%, and the Nasdaq 100 Index ($IUXX ) (QQQ ) closed up +0.84%. September E-mini S&P futures (ESU25 ) rose +0.43%, and September E-mini Nasdaq futures...

headline: ASYS vs. AMAT: Which Semiconductor Equipment Stock is the Better Buy?
summary: Amtech Systems outpaces Applied Materials with faster AI-driven growth, operational savings, and a cheaper valuation, making it the stronger semiconductor bet now.
